messages.message:
@dlluncor @Ashish SC just updated Instabase and is suddenly getting unexpected ACL faults in the FS. We're walking them through a series of experiments to help diagnose but haven't figured out what is the cause out here.


• The problem is experienced by site admins
• There exist certain folders that they retain read access to but have lost CREATE and MODIFY access to.
• If these folders are duplicated, they have CREATE and MODIFY access on the duplicated copy
• This problem is being experienced inside of organization owned repos (we haven't checked personal owned repos)
• This problem is being experienced even if you add FS ACLs explicitly granting access (which shouldn't be necessary since we're on a site-admin account)
when you say acl errors do you see “access denied” errors, or does it manifest in some other way?
